thread.title: Bruce: Clouds with front clearing tonight
thread.title_full: Bruce: Clouds with front clearing tonight - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Bruce Katz
title: Bruce: Clouds with front clearing tonight
text:
NEW ORLEANS, LA (WVUE) - With a cold front moving into the area today, a few showers are possible. We need the rain but most areas will stay dry as there is not a lot of moisture to work with.
The front is bringing a drop in dew points, meaning a drier less humid feel to the air as opposed to cooler temps. The drier air will allow morning lows to drop into the 50s on the North Shore to the lower 60s south.
Afternoon highs will remain in the lower 80s. A reinforcing cold front moves in for the weekend, dropping temps even more. It looks like the dry spell will last at least through this weekend.
Follow me on Twitter: @BruceKatzFOX8
- Meteorologist Bruce Katz
Copyright 2015 WVUE .
